text: Avijaja "Avi" Lund Järund (born December 6, 1966 in Qaqortoq, Kujalleq, Greenland, Denmark as Avijaja Petri) is a Danish female curler and curling coach. Also known as Avijaja "Avi" Lund, Avijaja Lund Nielsen, Avijaja Nielsen. She is a two-time and . She is a participant of the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" width=60| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead !
